aboutMe.title: About Me
aboutMe.intro: Hi, I’m Daniel — a full-stack developer passionate about clean code, scalable architectures, and clear interfaces. What excites me most is when frontend and backend come together seamlessly to turn an idea into a smooth user experience.

highlights.location: From Seligenstadt, Germany — I enjoy working remotely and in international teams.
highlights.mindset: Curious and growth-oriented — I explore new technologies every sprint and share my insights with the team.
highlights.problem: Analytical problem-solver — I break challenges into testable steps, measure results, and iterate toward the best solution.

skills.title: Skill Set
skills.description: An overview of my skills. I work with modern frontend and backend technologies, focusing on clean, scalable code. Continuous learning is part of my workflow — I stay flexible and adapt quickly to new developments.

cta.title: Missing
cta.text: Feel free to reach out. I’m always expanding my knowledge and learning new technologies with purpose.

projects.title: Featured Projects
projects.lead: Explore a selection of my work here – interact with projects to see my skills in action.

pokedex.title: Pokedex
pokedex.subtitle: API-based Pokédex
pokedex.description: A responsive Pokédex powered by the PokéAPI. Search, filter, and explore Pokémon stats with smooth animations and offline caching.

goblinSlayer.title: Goblin Slayer
goblinSlayer.subtitle: Jump ’n’ Run Web Game
goblinSlayer.description: A fully JavaScript-built browser game with custom design, combat mechanics, and modular enemy AI. Built on a component-based architecture and optimized for smooth performance.

heinze.name: S. Heinze
heinze.text: Collaborating with Daniel means always getting more than expected — his creativity finds its way into every detail.

schmidt.name: P. Schmidt
schmidt.text: Daniel is a creative and knowledgeable developer with an excellent sense of design. His innovative ideas, technical precision, and solution-oriented mindset enrich every project and make him a valuable asset to any team.

problem.title: Looking for a developer?
problem.description: I help teams and projects with clean code, solid architecture, and a strong focus on user experience. If you’re looking for a reliable full-stack developer who brings ideas to life — let’s talk.

generalInformation.title: 2. General Information
generalInformation.text: I take the protection of your personal data seriously. Your data is handled confidentially and in accordance with the applicable data protection laws, including the EU General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and the German Federal Data Protection Act (BDSG). This Privacy Policy explains what personal data is collected, how it is used, and your rights in relation to it.

hosting.title: 3. Hosting
hosting.text: This website is hosted by ALL-INKL.COM – Neue Medien Münnich, Hauptstraße 68, 02742 Friedersdorf, Germany. ALL-INKL processes data such as server log files to ensure stable and secure website operation. The legal basis for this is Article 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in secure website operation).

dataCollection.title: 4. Data Collection and Processing
dataCollection.intro: When visiting this website, your browser automatically transmits certain information:
dataCollection.outro: This data is not combined with other data sources and is deleted after no more than seven days. The processing is based on Article 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in the functionality and security of the website).

contactForm.title: 5. Contact Form
contactForm.text: If you contact me via the contact form, the data you enter (name, email address, message) will be processed to handle your request. The form is operated via EmailJS (EmailJS Ltd, 9 Appold St, London EC2A 2AP, United Kingdom).
contactForm.emailjs: EmailJS enables sending form data as an email message. The data is processed only for the purpose of transmitting your inquiry and temporarily stored.
contactForm.legalBasis: Legal basis: Article 6(1)(b) GDPR (performance of a contract or pre-contractual measures) and Article 6(1)(f) GDPR (legitimate interest in efficient communication). A Data Processing Agreement pursuant to Article 28 GDPR exists with EmailJS.
